thread.title: RevSpring’s October Webinar to Address the Importance of Designing Effective Documents to Reach Customers
thread.title_full: RevSpring’s October Webinar to Address the Importance of Designing Effective Documents to Reach Customers

author: Heather Taylor
title: RevSpring’s October Webinar to Address the Importance of Designing Effective Documents to Reach Customers
text:
On October 22 at 2 p.m. EDT, RevSpring will host its next webinar, “Designing Effective Documents.” Design elements must clearly express your brand while leading the customer to take action. In a well-defined communications strategy, your documents should generate response. You must identify the communication channels that best reach potential customers, while incorporating design best practices that create impact and lead to success.
Topics covered during this webinar include:
Understanding design platforms Creating and implementing effective workflows Maximizing cross-communication capabilities Assessing good design on customer response Maintaining cohesive branding
By attending this webinar, attendees will learn about the importance of choosing solutions that can cut through the clutter, as well as the steps to generating well-designed documents that elicit customer response.
Click here to register or contact learnmorea(at)revspringinc(dot)com for more information.
About RevSpring
RevSpring is a leading provider of revenue cycle technology services offering data analytics, multi-channel customer communications and payment solutions to the healthcare and financial services end markets. The company’s services enable customers to accelerate cash collections across the revenue cycle through an integrated, technology-driven and end-to-end service offering, all while ensuring regulatory compliance. For more information visit their web site at http://www.revspringinc.com .
